if only.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used to express a strong wish, especially when you know that what you want cannot happen
if only.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: If only he had talked to her sooner!
If only I weren’t so tired!
if only.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to give a reason for something, although you think it is not a good one
if only.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Media studies is regarded as a more exciting subject, if only because it’s new.
if only.translation[1].definitions[0].de: used to express a strong wish
